mapper.select: select r.no,r.cost,br.created_at,br.created_name,rule.name from f_finance_bill_record br,f_finance_record r,f_bill b,f_cost_rule rule where br.finance_record_id = r.id and br.bill_id = b.id and b.cost_rule_id = rule.id and r.id=#{map.billId}
select aa.payment_method,aa.oper_type,aa.no,bb.* from f_finance_record aa ,f_finance_bill_record bb where bb.finance_record_id = aa.id and bb.bill_id = #{billId}
